item.title: Into feminist thought? You might be interested in the Fem...
item.description:
Into feminist thought? You might be interested in the Feminist Theory Series I announce here: https://feministworks.substack.com/cp/173129108
Substack feminist getting together to share the feminist work we love. More info on how to join coming v soon.
item.author: Mona Mona

item.title: Putting this on my reading list, but immediately made me ...
item.description: Putting this on my reading list, but immediately made me think about how we treat all areas of our lives like itâ€™s work. Even basic life things like eating and sleeping becomes something to work at. Work is not just something we do, but an all-encompassing approach to life.
item.author: Mona Mona

item.title: Thank you to Work Matters for including my post about why...
item.description: Thank you to Work Matters for including my post about why self-care routines ultimately fail and what really works instead. Spoiler: it's not the complex practices we think we should want.
item.author: Mona Mona

item.title: Thank you so much for this, for sharing your personal exp...
item.description: Thank you so much for this, for sharing your personal experience. Yes, it has been for me that way as well, being laid off really shifted the ground under my feet and left me asking some big questions. I believe that because our identities are so tied to what we do, when we loose our jobs or even leave on our own, it an throw up our identities into an existential crisis of meaning. Itâ€™s also an opportunity to reshape our realities. ðŸ¥°
item.author: Mona Mona
